name: CommonEval (VoiceBench)
description: VoiceBench conversational subset derived from the CommonEval instruction-following benchmark.

metrics.name: score
metrics.definition: Preference or rubric score for dialogue quality

test_method: Follow VoiceBench pipeline to synthesize prompts to speech, then evaluate model audio responses using the provided judge prompt.
notes: Note whether latency constraints or streaming decoding were enforced during evaluation.
